attributes.action: Issue our Police with means to protect themselves against armed criminals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is becoming far too common that Police officers find themselves under the attack from armed criminals. When faced with such a high threat the Police can only fall back on the current defensive equipment (batton and Pava sprays). 

Ask yourself this; If you were confronted by someone with a knife or worse, wouldn't you like to have more than a metal stick or a chemical spray (that takes approx 10 seconds to take effect) to protect yourself and others around you.

By issuing our Police with taser devices they would be able to protect themselves and the public without risking anyone's life.
